combat1.name: Favonius Bladework - Ritual
combat1.descriptionRaw:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Performs up to 4 rapid strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

Normal Attack

combat2.name: Immersive Ordinance
combat2.descriptionRaw:
Time for a fun little trick! Summons the Sacramental Shower in different ways depending on whether you Tap or Hold it.

<color=#FFD780FF>Tap</color>
After a short prayer, summons the Sacramental Shower in front.

<color=#FFD780FF>Hold</color>
Engages in continuous prayer, and when done, summons forth a Sacramental Shower in the designated position.

<color=#FFD780FF>Sacramental Shower</color>
When opponents or nearby party members touch the Sacramental Shower, different effects will occur depending on the one who touches it:
If an opponent touches the Shower, it will explode and deal <color=#80C0FFFF>AoE Hydro DMG</color> to nearby opponents.
If a nearby party member touches it, it will bounce the one who touches it high in the air.

Only 1 Sacramental Shower summoned by Dahlia himself can be on the field at once.

combat3.name: Radiant Psalter
combat3.descriptionRaw:
Appeals to the divine with earnestness and song, dealing <color=#80C0FFFF>AoE Hydro DMG</color> to nearby opponents and granting his party members Favonian Favor, summoning a Shield of Sacred Favor.
The Shield of Sacred Favor's DMG absorption is based on Dahlia's Max HP, and it will absorb <color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG</color> with 250% effectiveness.

<color=#FFD780FF>Favonian Favor</color>
While this effect is active, 1 Benison stack may be consumed to summon a new Shield of Sacred Favor when an existing Shield is broken via DMG.

Dahlia can obtain Benison via the following methods:
· He will gain 1 Benison stack when his own active party member hits opponents 4 times with Normal Attacks while affected by Favonian Favor.
· After triggering the effect of his Passive Talent, "The Wind's Gentle Grace" (You must first unlock this Passive Talent.)
Dahlia can gain a maximum of 4 Benison stacks per Favonian Favor duration.

labels: Shield of Sacred Favor DMG Absorption|{param3:F1P} Max HP+{param2:I}

passive1.name: The Wind's Gentle Grace
passive1.descriptionRaw: When characters affected by the Favonian Favor effect of the Elemental Burst <color=#FFD780FF>Radiant Psalter</color> trigger Frozen reactions on opponents, they will grant Dahlia 2 Benison stacks. This effect can trigger once every 8s.
passive1.description: When characters affected by the Favonian Favor effect of the Elemental Burst Radiant Psalter trigger Frozen reactions on opponents, they will grant Dahlia 2 Benison stacks. This effect can trigger once every 8s.

passive2.name: Prayer of Well-Wrought Joy
passive2.descriptionRaw: When your active party member is affected by the Favonian Favor effect of the Elemental Burst <color=#FFD780FF>"Radiant Psalter,"</color> their ATK SPD will increase based on Dahlia's Max HP: Every 1,000 Max HP will cause an increase of 0.5%, up to a maximum of 20%.
passive2.description: When your active party member is affected by the Favonian Favor effect of the Elemental Burst "Radiant Psalter," their ATK SPD will increase based on Dahlia's Max HP: Every 1,000 Max HP will cause an increase of 0.5%, up to a maximum of 20%.

passive3.name: Pilgrimage Upon Returning Winds
passive3.descriptionRaw:
During the day (06:00 – 18:00), your party members gain the Swift Stride effect: Movement SPD increased by 10%.
Does not take effect in Domains, Trounce Domains, or the Spiral Abyss. Swift Stride does not stack.
